infobox_data.Ability: Can be toggled as the primary vehicle production structure (if the player have multiplewar factoriesat the same time)
Notes: The more war factories the player have, the faster vehicles are produced
Can be infiltrated for veteran vehicle production

article_tables.title: Standard vehicles
rows:
Resource Vehicle.
Requires  Foehn Ore Refinery
Abilities:
Harvests and unloads ore equivalent to 300 credits (450 for gems)
Repairs vehicles
Receives speed boost when nearby a Spinblade

Light Transport Vehicle. Strong vs. Infantry.
Abilities:
Transports infantry with 1 passenger slot
Infantry can fire out of the Jackal
Amphibious
Receives speed boost when nearby a Spinblade

Unmanned Light Vehicle. Strong vs. Aircraft (no ground attack).
Abilities:
Receives firepower boost when nearby a deployed SODAR Array

Main Battle Walker. Strong vs. Armor.
Abilities:
Deals double damage when firing at close range
Draco Light Tank

Main Battle Tank. Strong vs. Armor.
Abilities:
May release its turret as a controllable flying Draco Autoturret when destroyed
Receives speed boost when nearby a Spinblade

Main Battle Tank. Strong vs. Armor.
Abilities:
Repairs itself rapidly with nanites when damaged
Nanite repairs are more effective when stationary
Foehn MCV

Construction Vehicle. Unarmed.
Requires Cloud Piercer
Deploys into an Foehn Construction Yard
Sonic Detection and Ranging Array

Support Vehicle.
Requires Cloud Piercer
Abilities:
Detects cloaked units
Deploy to detect cloaked units and increase firepower of friendly units armed with Golden Rockets on a large radius
Amphibious; can deploy on water

Support Vehicle.
Requires Cyberkernel
Abilities:
Disable weapons of enemy vehicles and aircraft
Disable structures
Blocks the use of enemy support powers (except scout powers) around itself

Support Vehicle.
Requires Cyberkernel
Abilities:
Disable weapons of enemy vehicles and aircraft
Disable structures
Blocks the use of enemy support powers (except scout powers) around itself
Amphibious
Receives speed boost when nearby a Spinblade

Support Vehicle.
Requires Cyberkernel
Abilities:
Confusion
Deploy to switch to illumination flares that weakens enemy armor

Unmanned Hit-and-Run Vehicle. Strong vs. Infantry, Armor.
Requires Cloud Piercer
Abilities:
Detects disguised units
Disables itself temporarily after attacking
Receives speed boost when nearby a Spinblade

Unmanned Light Vehicle. Strong vs. Infantry, Armor.
Requires Nanofiber Loom
Abilities:
Must deploy to attack
Cloaked when deployed
Amphibious
Receives firepower boost when nearby a deployed SODAR Array
Receives speed boost when nearby a Spinblade

Unmanned Monster Walker. Strong vs. Ground Targets.
Requires Cyberkernel upgraded with  Cyberkernel Expansion
Abilities:
Reduces the speed of enemy units
Receives a reactive shield that boosts speed when nearby a Megaarena Projector
Reactive shield instantly kills infantry (except heroes) on contact
Shadray Sonic Tank

Medium Artillery. Strong vs. Infantry, Aircraft, Structures.
Requires Cyberkernel upgraded with  Cyberkernel Expansion
Mutually Assured Destruction Mechanized Area Nullifier

Epic Super-Heavy Suicide Vehicle. Strong vs. Ground Targets.
Requires Cyberkernel upgraded with  Cyberkernel Expansion
Abilities:
Deploy to activate warhead; activation takes a long time
Does not explode violently when destroyed before activating warhead
Can crush vehicles
Immune to most hazards
Only one M.A.D.M.A.N. may be produced at a time.

Hovercraft Artillery. Strong vs. Structures.
Requires Cloud Piercer upgraded with  Cloud Piercer Expansion
Abilities:
Amphibious
Receives speed boost when nearby a Spinblade

Support Vehicle.
Requires Cloud Piercer upgraded with  Cloud Piercer Expansion
Deploy to disable weapons of vehicles and aircraft
Affects both friendly and enemy vehicles and aircraft
Amphibious
Receives speed boost when nearby a Spinblade
Only two Orcinus Waveshapers may be produced at a time.

Monster Tank. Strong vs. Armor.
Requires Nanofiber Loom upgraded with  Nanofiber Loom Expansion
Abilities:
Repairs itself rapidly with nanites when damaged
Nanite repairs are more effective when stationary
Can crush vehicles
Nanocharge repairs itself and nearby friendly mechanical units

Heavy Transport Vehicle. Strong vs. Infantry, Structures.
Requires Nanofiber Loom upgraded with  Nanofiber Loom Expansion
Abilities:
Amphibious
Comes with 3 Knightframes already onboard
Transports infantry with 3 passenger slots
Immune to all hazards

Epic Super-Heavy Vehicle. Strong vs. Infantry, Armor.
Requires Nanofiber Loom upgraded with  Nanofiber Loom Expansion
Abilities:
Deploy to charge and fire Boid Blitz and M.A.D. Mine
Support power countdown restarts when undeploying
Immune to most hazards
Only one Boidmachine may be produced at a time.

article_tables.title: Stolen Tech
rows:
Stolen Tech Vehicle. Strong vs. Armor, Aircraft.
Requires infiltration of Tech Center and Allied Construction Yard
Requires Foehn technology expansion
Abilities:
Disguises as a tree when stationary
Receives firepower boost when near a deployed SODAR Array
Deploy to switch between auto attack or hold fire modes

Stolen Tech Vehicle. Strong vs. Armor, Structures.
Requires infiltration of Palace/Battle Lab/Atomheart and Soviet Construction Yard
Requires Foehn technology expansion
Abilities:
EMP disable heavy infantry and mechanical units temporarily

Stolen Tech Vehicle. Strong vs. Infantry.
Requires the infiltration of Pandora Hub and Epsilon Construction Yard
Requires Foehn technology expansion
Abilities:
Detects cloaked units
Creates nanoclouds on killed enemy infantry
Nanoclouds heal friendly infantry
Cloaked
Amphibious
Resistant to main battle tank shells
Immune to all hazards
Deploy to switch between auto attack or hold fire modes

Stolen Tech Vehicle. Strong vs. Armor, Structures.
Requires the infiltration of Cloud Piercer and Foehn Construction Yard
Requires Foehn technology expansion
Abilities:
Deploy to disable structures around itself temporarily
